alert.note: Alert for Big Hole Mountains; Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 23 at 1:40PM MST until December 23 at 10:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of moderate to heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches below 6300 feet with up to 15 inches possible across the mountains and passes above 6300 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph may create areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Centennial and Big Hole Mountains from Targhee Pass south through Pine Creek Pass. * WHEN...Until 10 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Big Hole Mountains; Centennial Mountains, Island Park
